msgs.msg1: We'll make suggestions based on what we know about you (age, gender, salary). And we will ask questions to make sure we have the details right.
dependentSummary.msg1: , will you be covering anyone other than yourself for health plans (Medical, Dental or Vision)?
dependentSummary.msg2: Plan costs are based on whom you choose to cover.
tobaccoUsage.msg1: Tell us about the tobacco usage of each covered family member
